page.title: 04RIDDLESDEN CRICKET CLUB
page.content: Riddlesden has one cricket club, on Grange Road, that has been in use from 1889. The club hut was made by the members only. It has been there for 4/5 years. The people who run the club do not know who opened the grounds, they were actually opened about 1819. The members at the time decided to have it where it is. The cricket members have to pay Â£1000 a year to run it. There was another Riddlesden Club near Bensons. Farmland was there before the club. The members have owned the club for about 3 years. There are about 25-30 cricketers. They play on Saturday and Sunday. The ground takes up 2/3 acres.
